data.meta_description: Discover comfort and convenience at SK Residence in Islamabad. With a garden, terrace, and private parking, our recently renovated property offers a relaxing stay. Enjoy modern amenities, including free WiFi and flat-screen TVs, and explore nearby attract
data.text:
Your reservation is absolutely secure. LBN takes the privacy of your personal data very seriously. Your personal information will only be used to process your booking. For more information, read our privacy statement.

LBN will not charge you any reservation fees for making this booking, nor charge your credit card. You will simply pay for your stay at the hotel.

Cancellation is free of charge provided you adhere to the notification period stated in the hotel cancellation policy ( see "Policies" tab).

More information can be found in our terms and conditions.
